snippet: A closer look at assertions made by President Obama and Vice President Joseph R. Biden Jr. on the economy, energy policy, Medicare and Afghanistan.
abstract: Checkpoint column evaluates the accuracy of assertions made during speeches by Pres Obama and Vice Pres Joseph R Biden Jr at the Democratic National Convention.

byline.original: By ANNIE LOWREY, JOHN M. BRODER, MICHAEL COOPER and DAVID E. SANGER

lead_paragraph: A closer look at assertions made by President Obama and Vice President Joseph R. Biden Jr. on the economy, energy policy, Medicare and Afghanistan.

headline.seo: Checking Facts on Obama and Biden Speeches
headline.main: A Night of Speeches Under a Magnifying Glass
headline.print_headline: A Night of Speeches Under a Magnifying Glass
